source.3f37a0ad:
import qgrid
from sklearn.datasets import load_iris
import pandas as pd

data = load_iris()
df = pd.DataFrame(data.data, columns=data.feature_names)
qgrid_widget = qgrid.show_grid(df, show_toolbar=True)
qgrid_widget
